from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = len(nums)
        ind = SortedList()
        d = defaultdict(int)
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n//2):
            ind.add(max( abs(k-nums[n-i-1]), nums[n-i-1], abs(nums[i]-k), nums[i] ))
            d[abs(nums[i]-nums[n-i-1])] += 1
        for i in range(k+1):
            b = bisect.bisect_left(ind,i)
            ans = min(ans,(n//2)+b-d[i])
        return ans
